description: A study of Norwegian literature from the Saga period through Ibsen, this chronological overview examines literary developments in the context of historical, cultural, and linguistic change and relates Norwegian literature to international trends. Lectures, essays, and class discussion are in Norwegian. Prerequisite: NORW 253 or equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Norsk Lit Til 1890
prerequisites: NORW 253 or equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: NORW 253 or equivalent. Offered annually in the fall semester.

title: Norwegian Literature from the Saga Period to 1890
